glb.initFnCdn(glb.cdnConfig)},glb.fnTimeoutMs))}).call(this);</script>
<script>
    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class='header-navegacao header-editoria header-navegacao-ge' data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_mobile_topo" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_MOBILE != "undefined" && OAS_MOBILE("x60")</script></div></div></header><script>
      window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS = window.RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS || {};
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.autoChangeImages = true;
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.screenWidths = [['desktop', 1065], ['tablet', 768], ['smart_horizontal', 360], ['smart', 0]];
      RESPONSIVE_SETTINGS.thumborUrl = "";
    </script><script>
    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);
  </script></div></div></div></div></div><div id="glb-corpo"><!-- PUBLIEDITORIAL --><!-- possui template smart --><div class='row bloco-wide'><div class="small-12 medium-12 large-12 columns"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_super"><div id="banner_super" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div><div class="row ge-destaques"><div class="gui-carousel-component-container" id="gui-carousel-highlight"><!-- PASSO 1 --><div class="gui-item-carousel"><div class="small-6 medium-6 large-6 columns gui-carousel-component-left-column"><div class="gui-headline destaque destaque-tracking destaque-box-destaque-principal-fotao-fotinha tipo-fotao glb-hl-style-fotao-base-esquerdo"><a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/games/noticia/2017/03/felipe-yoda-sai-da-reserva-e-vive-tarde-iluminada-na-vitoria-contra-pain.html"

                        height="280"

                <p class="gui-text-headline"><strongsportv news</strong></p>

        </a><i class="gui-icon gui-color-primary gui-icon-arrow-right2"></i></footer></section><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div></div></section><!-- /.ge-conteudo-principal --><div class="row"></div><div class="row bloco-wide"><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_floating"><div id="banner_floating" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div></div><!-- possui template smart --></div><footer id="glb-rodape"><div id="glb-diretorio">

a==="string"?e.key?a.replace(/(<\w+)(?=[\s>])(?![^>]*_tmplitem)([^>]*)/g,"$1 "+d+'="'+e.key+'" $2'):a:j(a,e,a._ctnt)}):e;if(g)return b=document.createElement("div");b.innerHTML=c;return a.makeArray(b.childNodes)}function o(b){return new Function("jQuery","$item","var $=jQuery,call,__=[],$data=$item.data;with($data){__.push('"+a.trim(b).replace(/([\\'])/g,"\\$1").replace(/[\r\t\n]/g," ").replace(/\$\{([^\}]*)\}/g,"{{= $1}}").replace(/\{\{(\/?)(\w+|.)(?:\(((?:[^\}]|\}(?!\}))*?)?\))?(?:\s+(.*?)?)?(\(((?:[^\}]|\}(?!\}))*?)\))?\s*\}\}/g,function(m,l,k,g,b,c,d){var j=a.tmpl.tag[k],i,e,f;if(!j)throw"Unknown template tag: "+k;i=j._default||[];if(c&&!/\w$/.test(b)){b+=c;c=""}if(b){b=h(b);d=d?","+h(d)+")":c?")":"";e=c?b.indexOf(".")>-1?b+h(c):"("+b+").call($item"+d:b;f=c?e:"(typeof("+b+")==='function'?("+b+").call($item):("+b+"))"}else f=e=i.$1||"null";g=h(g);return"');"+j[l?"close":"open"].split("$notnull_1").join(b?"typeof("+b+")!=='undefined' && n(c,b){c._wrap=j(c,true,a.isArray(b)?b:[q.test(b)?b:a(b).html()]).join("")}function h(a){return a?a.replace(/\\'/g,"'").replace(/\\\\/g,"\\"):null}function s(b){var a=document.createElement("div");a.appendChild(b.cloneNode(true));return a.innerHTML}function m(o){var n="_"+c,k,j,l={},e,p,h;for(e=0,p=o.length;e<p;e++){if((k=o[e]).nodeType!==1)continue;j=k.getElementsByTagName("*");for(h=j.length-1;h>=0;h--)m(j[h]);m(k)}function m(j){var p,h=j,k,e,m;if(m=j.getAttribute(d)){while(h.parentNode&&(h=h.parentNode).nodeType===1&&!(p=h.getAttribute(d)));if(p!==m){h=h.parentNode?h.nodeType===11?0:h.getAttribute(d)||0:0;if(!(e=b[m])){e=f[m];e=g(e,b[h]||f[h]);e.key=++i;b[i]=e}c&&o(m)}j.removeAttribute(d)}else if(c&&(e=a.data(j,"tmplItem"))){o(e.key);b[e.key]=e;h=a.data(j.parentNode,"tmplItem");h=h?h.key:0}if(e){k=e;while(k&&k.key!=h){k.nodes.push(j);k=k.parent}delete e._ctnt;delete e._wrap;a.data(j,"tmplItem",e)}function o(a){a=a+n;e=l[a]=l[a]||g(e,b[e.parent.key+n]||e.parent)}}}function u(a,d,c,b){if(!a)return l.pop();l.push({_:a,tmpl:d,item:this,data:c,options:b})}function w(d,c,b){return a.tmpl(a.template(d),c,b,this)}function x(b,d){var c=b.options||{};c.wrapped=d;return a.tmpl(a.template(b.tmpl),b.data,c,b.item)}function v(d,c){var b=this._wrap;return a.map(a(a.isArray(b)?b.join(""):b).filter(d||"*"),function(a){return c?a.innerText||a.textContent:a.outerHTML||s(a)})}function t(){var b=this.nodes;a.tmpl(nu
